page.title: 03The Beginnings
page.content: We were waiting with great anticipation to know the area we had been allocated. It seemed that every new day brought with it a different area which we sometimes shared with others schools and sometimes did not. Finally we embarked on the survey after carefully ensuring that our class had chosen the best option. The "Red Peril" was threatened with a certain driver and it leapt into action, obediently following directions which at times seemed impossible. Down narrow tracks, over bus-passes,along the highways and by-ways we travelled. Not one telephone or post-box was left undiscovered..... pity they were not needed. Never mind it's finished and so are we.
